attributes.action: Work with Cornwall County Council so that it equally recognizes cherishes and promotes all variants of written Cornish past present and future, and adopts a Council-only variant that is universally acceptable and neutral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is in favour of promoting diversity of written Cornish.

This petition calls for

1. A single publicly-funded Cornish language body that

1.1 Equally recognizes promotes and cherishes all past present and future forms of written Cornish. 

1.2 Facilitates early learning so that all major variants are taught in a manner that is without favour or prejudice.

1.3 Ensures that all variants respect and value each other.


2. Agreement on a neutral written form for the sole use of the Council. 

2.1. Possible forms being: UC, UCR-Authenticized, Normalization of a historical text, a new form, or other.

2.2. This form should not compete or conflict with the interests of any non-Council variant.

2.3. The Council to replace this form with Universal Modern Cornish when all parties agree that such a Universal Modern Cornish exists in the wider population of Cornwall.
